definitions.definition: used to say that a particular thing can or will happen only after something else happens or becomes true:
examples: I'll pay you double if you get the work finished by Friday.
They're great kids, even if they can be demanding.
If water is heated to 100°C it turns to steam.

definitions.definition: used to mean "if it is true that":
examples: I'm very sorry if I've offended you.

definitions.definition: something that is not certain or not yet decided:
examples: There's a big if hanging over the project (= it is uncertain whether the project will happen).
